ADTEXT_1.message: MESSAGE. Pilot bound for {system} is needed to carry message for {cash}

ADTEXT_2.message: MESSAGE. Need someone to bring an important message to {system} for {cash}

ADTEXT_3.message: MESSAGE. Feeling keen on delivering a message to {system}? Will pay {cash}

ADTEXT_4.message: MESSAGE. Going to {system}? There's {cash} to be earned

ADTEXT_5.message: MESSAGE. Deliver private message to {system}. Will pay {cash}

ADTEXT_7.message: MESSAGE. Bound for {system}? Bring a message and earn {cash}

AGREED.description: Said by the contract giver when accepting a mission

COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you please repeat the original request?

FAILUREMSG_1.message: What good is this message now?

FLAVOUR_2_MISSIONTXT.message:
Hi! My name is {client} and I need you to, in person, tell {recipient} at {starport} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 
"{message}"
 You'll receive {cash} for your trouble.

FLAVOUR_3_MISSIONTXT.message:
For {cash}, could you please tell {recipient} at {starport} in system {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) that {client} says 
"{message}"

FLAVOUR_4_MISSIONTXT.description:
Note: no space after the line break: "
"
FLAVOUR_4_MISSIONTXT.message:
Please deliver this message: 
"{message}"
to {recipient} of {starport} in {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) and tell them {client} says hi. You will get {cash}.

FLAVOUR_5_MISSIONTXT.message:
Hi! I need you to tell {recipient} at {starport} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) 
"{message}"
I will pay {cash}.

HOW_SOON_MUST_IT_BE_DELIVERED.message: How soon must it be delivered?

MESSAGE_3.message: The fat lady sings no more

MESSAGE_8.message: The golden chariot will ride the sky

MESSAGE_9.message: Look out for the sign of the black mark

MESSAGE_10.message: You've bought yourself one more week

MESSAGE_11.message: Not even you will live forever

MESSAGE_17.message: From now on, you're on your own

MESSAGE_25.message: Pay with cash now, or your life later

MESSAGE_26.message: You will not testify at the trial

MESSAGE_27.message: You are running out of options

MESSAGE_36.message: I'm in need of another delivery

MESSAGE_51.message: I'm not going to make it

MESSAGE_55.message: There will be no next time
